alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Houston; Olmsted; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 11:53PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeast Minnesota through 1245 AM CDT... At 1152 PM CDT, automated weather stations reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Charles to near Grand Meadow. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Automated weather stations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lewiston around 1205 AM CDT. Wykoff around 1215 AM CDT. Rushford around 1225 AM CDT. Preston around 1230 AM CDT. Harmony around 1240 AM CDT. Canton around 1245 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Forestville State Park, Choice, County Roads 6 And 33, Wyattville, Isinours, Hutton, Fillmore, Utica, Peterson and Rushford Village. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 234 and 249. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
